Anyone looking at Inter vs Hellas Verona Odds will see that Verona needs to be more effective at finishing to earn the points necessary to climb the standings. Verona has produced an xG of .9 or less in its past two matches. Verona did get a recent win over fellow relegation target Cagliari, which boosted its spirits. However, with Inter on the [Serie A schedule](https://insidersbettingdigest.com/soccer/serie-a/schedule/) and some other tough opponents on the horizon, Verona won’t be able to celebrate too long. Cyril Ngonge leads Veron with five goals, while Milan Duric has four. Beyond that, Verona has struggled to develop effective attacking players who can finish consistently.
